sourcesContent:
ABOUT

Who I Am

I'm front-end developer with 2 years of experience designing and building responsive web.
I'v HTML5 , CSS (Bootstrap and Material UI), Sass, JavaScript, Angular.JS .
Some of Git & Github.

I started studying programming a 2 years ago and went a long way.
To gain more coding experience, I completed Udacity Cross Skilling Angular Nanodegree, which taught me Components, Libraries, and Data to develop my own web applications.
